DOC.brief_summary: The current study aim investigate oxytocin effect response experience like dislike .
DOC.brief_title: Oxytocin Effects Likeability After Being Liked Disliked
DOC.detailed_description: In double-blind , between-subject , placebo control design study , researcher aim investigate intranasal OXT ( 40IU ) treatment rating response like dislike healthy male subject . All subject complete range questionnaire measure personality affective trait level anxiety : Positive Negative Affect Schedule ( PANAS ) , State-Trait Anxiety Inventory ( STAI ) , Beck Depression Inventory ( BDI ) , Cheek Buss shyness Scale ( CBSS ) , Autism Spectrum Quotient ( ASQ ) , Empathy Quotient ( EQ ) self-administration.Study participant lead believe participant form opinion likability base appearance photograph passively view response ( like dislike ) 'other participant ' . After , rat 'other participant ' likeability ( much like person ) , accuracy ( see person ) , feel ( good feel ) , tendency ( much would like him/her friend ) . Likeability , tendency , feel accuracy include analysis dependent variable .
DOC.criteria: Healthy subject without past current psychiatric neurological disorder history head injury ; claustrophobia ; medical psychiatric illness .
